idea-plugin.name: Test Navigator
idea-plugin.description:
Plugin adds a new gutter icon, which marks java class as a tested class (if corresponding test class exists) or as a class without tests.
Moreover, it allows to navigate between such joined classes.

The suffixes for test classes discovery can be configured in: "Settings -> Tools -> Test Navigator".
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Release 1.0: First release.
Release 1.1: Bug fixing. JUnit 5 tests supported.
Release 2.0: Test class suffixes became configurable.
Release 2.1: Bug fixing and meaningful messages.
Release 3.0: Groovy / Spock tests support.
Release 4.0: Gradle projects support.
Release 4.1: Fix greedy suffix detector.
